thread.section_title: Hotel Augustin - Astotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nicely designed and good service
thread.title_full: Nicely designed and good service - Review of Hotel Augustin - Astotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: AvigdorGal
title: Nicely designed and good service
text: The two nights spent in Paris in this hotel were as pleasant as can be at the end of February with the last winds of winter still bring chill to the bone. The hotel is reasonably located (walking distance from central Paris) and nicely designed. Rooms are big-city small with all amenities working properly. Breakfast is standard.
